install.name: Udjamaflip's Automated Tag Cloud
install.author: Andy Sharman
install.description: This module displays an automatically generated tag cloud from the content on your Joomla website.

param.name: minSize
param.label: Min Font Size (px)
param.description: The size of the smallest element in the list of tags in Pixels.

param.name: maxSize
param.label: Max Font Size (px)
param.description: The size of the largest element in the list of tags in Pixels.

param.name: tagCount
param.label: Word Tag Count
param.description: The amount of words you would like to show in your tag cloud.

param.name: minWordLength
param.label: Word min length
param.description: The amount of characters required to be included within the tag cloud.

param.name: maxRowCount
param.label: Row Count
param.description: The maximum number of rows from each section to use to evaluate the tag cloud.

param.name: articles
param.label: Use Joomla articles
param.description: Use content from the Joomla articles to generate the tag cloud

param.name: ccboard
param.label: Use ccBoard Posts
param.description: Use content from the ccBoard posts in your ccBoard forum to generate the tag cloud

param.name: virtuemart
param.label: Use VirtueMart products
param.description: Use content from the Virtuemart product descriptions to generate the tag cloud

param.name: jcomments
param.label: Use JComments
param.description: Use content from the JComment comments to generate the tag cloud

param.name: k2comments
param.label: Use K2 Comments
param.description: Use content from the k2 comments to generate the tag cloud

param.name: k2content
param.label: Use K2 Content
param.description: Use content from the k2 content items to generate the tag cloud

param.name: excludeList
param.label: Exlude List
param.description: Write here words you would like to not be displayed in your tag cloud. (plurals will be excluded automatically, as will any word shorter than 3 chars.)

param.name: signature
param.label: Allow a discreet signature to www.udjamaflip.com
param.description: Allow a discreet signature to www.udjamaflip.com
param.option: I refuse to support the development.
